    Compute the robust estimator for tau.

    robust_estimate.Rd

    Compute the robust estimator for tau.

    robust_estimate(
  Y_mat_or,
  W_mat_or,
  Z,
  unit_covariates = NULL,
  time_covariates = NULL,
  index_sub = NULL,
  T_0 = NULL,
  unit_names = NULL,
  time_column = TRUE,
  seed = 1234
)

    Arguments

    Y_mat_or

    an nxT matrix of outcome.

    W_mat_or

    an nxT matrix of endogenous treatment.

    Z

    an nx1 vector of an aggregate instrument.

    index_sub

    an nx1 vector with binary coordinates. If one of the coordinates is TRUE, we include this state in the estimation.

    T_0

    the size of the learning period.

    unit_names

    an nx1 vector with unit names. It is used only in plot_1 function.

    time_column

    If true, the units are in the rows and the time periods are in the columns in Y_mat_or and W_mat_or.

    seed,

    seed to set.

    D

    an nx1 vector of exposure.

    Value

    A robust estimator with result, attached as an attribute. It is an output of basic_analysis function.

    Contents

    Developed by Dmitry Arkhangelsky.
